card_text: You can Tribute 1 "Ki-sikil" monster or 1 "Lil-la" monster, then activate 1 of the following effects.$N●You can target 1 "Ki-sikil" monster or 1 "Lil-la" monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the original ATK of the Tributed monster, until the end of this turn.$N●When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field: You can negate that effect.$NYou can only use this effect of "Evil★Twin GG EZ" once per turn.
